Description:
Watch The Bay Change All Day
Enjoy the ever changing bay and You Yang views from this impressive multi-level steel framed 4 bedroom plus study family home. Step inside to open plan living with stylish kitchen, walk in pantry, dishwasher, ceramic cook top and electric oven. Gas heater and reverse cycle split system in the light filled lounge which opens to the outdoor entertaining area on the deck that wraps the upper level. The first bedroom is also on this level with built in robes. On the middle level you will enjoy a generous study, bedroom number two with robes and the master bedroom with walk in robes. Central large bathroom with spa bath and separate toilet. Third level has the fourth spacious bedroom with built in robes. Second family/rumpus room with sliding doors to paved pergola. Mega sized laundry with bench and plenty of storage. This ground level also has the 2nd bathroom with toilet and shower, perfect for after beach use. This level is ideal as guest quarters or a retreat for the teenager in the family. Outside you have a tranquil low maintenance native garden with shed. Single carport and off street parking for three cars. Plenty of space for a boat or caravan down the side to tick another box off your list. All sitting pretty on approximately 585m2 allotment in a quiet neighbourhood, close to boat ramp, golf club, tennis courts, parks, local schools, public transport, medical facilities and new shopping centre.
Insights: 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Open Plan with Northerly Aspect
Large open plan living is the key feature to this brilliant Clifton Springs home; running the length of the home the newly renovated kitchen flows onto the dining area and into the lounge room, all with a brilliant northerly aspect and natural light. The master bedroom enjoys a full ensuite and Walk in Robe, whilst the remaining 2 bedrooms have a central bathroom in their separated quarters of the home. The rear deck overlooks the large yard, ample off street parking for the cars and a single garage currently set up as a Man Cave. Brilliant for those looking for position and scope!

Description:
A View To Boast About!
If you're looking for a family home with a smart floor plan, amazing views and within close proximity to some of Clifton Springs best features, then this is for you! This property occupies approx. 585m2 of land and is only a short drive to schools, boat ramp and the Clifton Springs Golf Club.
This property features three spacious bedrooms, two with built in robes and access to a central bathroom while the master has an ensuite and walk-in robe. From the kitchen/living room you can look out to the rear of the property to get a stunning glimpse of the best of what Geelong has to offer, with views of Simonds Stadium and the Geelong Marina. This property includes a gas log heater and an abundance of storage solutions. Outside is a double carport and a separate shed which is perfect for storing a boat, caravan or tool trailer!
Whether you are entering the market, changing your lifestyle or wanting to secure your next investment, this is the property for you! Book an inspection today.
Insights: 4 Bukatilla Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Private & serene, a family delight.
Set in beautiful and private landscaped gardens and located only minutes from the Clifton Springs Golf Club, this delightful family home showcases indoor-outdoor living. Wonderfully presented, this three bedroom home enjoys an abundance of natural light and space throughout courtesy of its well-designed, contemporary floorplan. The open plan living zone enjoys north and east aspects for year round entertaining and enjoyment.
Additional features included direct access from the double garage with remote roller door, split system heating and air conditioning and a 3000lt water tank.
An inspection will impress. Call today to book yours.

Description:
A QUIET COURT POSITION, WALK TO CLUBS, THE DELL AND JETTY... WILL NOT LAST!
This private leafy position is the perfect setting for this gracious home, a reproduction period appeal gives warmth with high ceilings to enhance. Foyer entrance, extra-large formal lounge room (could be two rooms), another generous open plan living includes dining, kitchen, sitting and study area all opening to the undercover patio. Three bedrooms, master with WIR and ensuite, second with BIR as does the third single bedroom. Central bathroom, shower room, separate toilet and laundry. Features include daddo, rosettes, cornices, pantry, split system and gas heater. Double garage with room for workshop space as well. The floorplan allows room to change without extension if a bigger third bedroom is considered. A very appealing home in one of the best spots on the Bellarine Peninsula.

Description:
LARGE FAMILY HOME ON OVER 1000m2 , ABSOLUTE HAVEN !
Light filled and renovated with generous proportions, this 3 bed, 2 bath, 2 living home on over 1000m2 of land is perfect. Doors open from second living to undercover decking space overlooking the lush garden. Features include ducted gas heating, evaporative cooling, dishwasher, pantry, gas BB, security system and more. With large carport to fit 3+ cars and room for the caravan, boat and trailer. The master bedroom has full ensuite and WIR further bedrooms with BIR. With an open plan living/dining/kitchen and a formal lounge and dining, this home ticks all the right boxes. Possible subdivision down the track if you wanted (STCA). Close to schools, all amenities and parklands... a real winner!

Description:
Here Is A Real Charmer
Immaculate best describes this superb 3 bedroom family home in the very popular location of Clifton Springs. Landscaped gardens greet you as pull your car into long driveway which could easily host 4-5 cars. Sit down on the private porch to relax & enjoy a cup of tea. Step inside to a gas log fire in the light filled lounge also with reverse cycle split system. Tiled open plan dining & modern kitchen to keep the cook of the family ever so happy which is complimented by plenty of cupboard space, stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, electric oven & gas hot plates. 3 large bedrooms all have built in robes plus ceiling fans. Great laundry with rear yard access & seperate toilet. Central bathroom has bath, shower & single vanity basin with lots of storage. Out the back the gorgeous gardens continue along a retaining wall to a private undercover pergola with plenty of space for kids or pets to enjoy in a secure & safe backyard. Garden shed & single plus garage complete this package. In a quiet court location on approximate 661m2 block. Close to the Dell, our ever changing bay, golf club, local schools, public transport, medical facilities & shopping centres.
Insights: 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Opportunity Knocks!
A fantastic opportunity exists for the first home buyer or investor to purchase this neat 3 bedroom home set on a generous 621m2 allotment. This property with a little TLC will come up a treat. The lounge and adjoining meals area are kept comfortable all year round with reverse cycle split system and solid fuel heater whilst a north facing sun-room at the rear of the home makes a delightful space to relax with a book. Vehicle access to the rear of the property with a freestanding double garage. This property is positioned in a quiet part of Clifton Springs with schools, shops and sporting facilities only a short distance, not to mention all the beautiful Bellarine Peninsula has on offer! If you're looking for a property with loads of potential, this is it- and at the right price.

Description:
Bay and Valley Outlook in Elevated Clifton Springs Location
Situated in an elevated pocket of the peaceful Clifton Springs seaside township on the Bellarine Peninsula, this land block 745 sq.m, 19.36m x 41.05m is a rare opportunity to secure high-quality land in a rapidly developing coastal town.
(Please quote code 2329 when enquiring about this property.)
Featuring excellent valley views of the town, Corio Bay and Geelong, as well as a north-facing rear yard and a downwards slope towards the street, this location is perfect for building a magnificent family home or luxury holiday getaway.
The property is within a stone's throw of the local Drysdale shopping village, schools, parklands, the Clifton Springs Golf Club and boating ramps in Corio Bay.
Located a short 20 minute drive via Portarlington Road to Geelong, this location provides a quiet semi-rural lifestyle, situated within easy reach of the convenience and vibrant activity of the city.
(Once again, please quote code 2329 when enquiring about this property.)
Insights: 3 Gange Place, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017.

Three bedrooms main with WIR and ensuite, other two have BIR'S. Central bathroom, laundry and separate toilet. Description:
Meticulously Renovated on a 1171 sqm block
This meticulous renovation has revitalised this amazing property. The two light & bright living areas both face north with views of the You Yangs and bay whilst the open plan family room also enjoys access onto the entertaining deck and Pool. The master bedroom and main sleeping quarters are separated by the two living spaces and the heart of the home the modern and updated kitchen and dining area. Both the ensuite and central bathroom have both been renovated to the highest of standards whilst the gardens and pool area make great use of the 1171sqm block. A double garage with drive through access for storage of boats and trailers is ample enough parking, there is also designated off street parking for the larger assets like caravans and boats. An inspection of this brilliant property will not disappoint!!!

Description:
UNDER CONTRACT
Showcasing a harmonious blend of comfort and splendour, this contemporary home is pure perfection! The expansive parcel of land provides spacious family living both inside and out, while the superb locale promises a truly enviable lifestyle.
With the Clifton Springs Golf Course and boat ramp a short drive away; locations don't get much better than this. The region's finest wineries are virtually on your doorstep, while nearby shops, schools, and public transport makes for effortless family living.
An abundance of natural light sweeps through the interiors, which feature floating floorboards and high ceilings.
The open plan living/dining/kitchen provides the focus of the home and offers sensational entertaining options. Snuggle up to the wood heater with a glass of red on a cold winters night, throw open the doors onto the sun-drenched deck for a fun-filled family gathering, or simply enjoy a quiet moment in the sheltered alfresco.
The kitchen makes a statement with stone bench tops and a large island bench. A built-in pantry puts the practical elements in place, while an integrated dishwasher and 900mm freestanding stainless steel oven, gas hob, and rangehood ensure the utmost quality.
The lounge provides another generous space for relaxation, away from the hustle and bustle of the main living zone.
Parents will fall in love with the Master Retreat. Glass double doors open onto the deck for a fabulous open-air vibe in the warmer months, while his-and-her walk-in robes and a lush en suite with large semi-frameless shower are simply divine.
Two additional bedrooms with built-in robes, main bathroom, and versatile fourth bedroom or study.
Ducted heating and evaporative cooling provide modern comfort.
The spacious backyard is a haven for children and adults alike. Landscaped gardens and hedges create a wonderful sense of privacy, while fruit trees and a chook pen provides you with plentiful fresh produce. Treat yourself to fresh eggs in the morning or enjoy peaches, cherries, nashi pears, and more straight from the branch! 26 solar panels and a rainwater tank with pump promote sustainable living.
The remote double lock-up garage features internal access, while the large carport boasts a gable roof for boat, caravan, or trailer storage. Vehicle access to the backyard is a welcome addition.
Don't miss this opportunity to embrace a sensational family lifestyle in Clifton Springs!
Insights: 58 Narawi Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
A Home Amongst The Trees!
Situated on a corner allotment of approx. 553m2 in the heart of Clifton Springs, this four bedroom property boasts light filled living areas and northerly orientation, making it perfect for any first home buyer, renovator or investor looking to enter an ever growing market!
All four bedrooms have BIRs with the master having its own ensuite whilst the remaining have access to a central bathroom and separate toilet. The first of two living areas is the formal front lounge bathed in natural light. The open plan kitchen/dining has the luxury of a Coonara wood fire
and exits out to the undercover entertainment area perfect for all year round enjoyment!
As an added bonus this property has the potential for drive through access, perfect for a boat or caravan. All this is complimented by a family friendly yard, just waiting for any keen gardener to put their special touch on this property.
An inspection is a must as this property won't last long in the current market!

Address: 81 Bay Shore Avenue Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
High & Mighty
Nature was showing off when it created the Bellarine Peninsula with its undulating hills, beautiful soil for vines and views across Port Phillip Bay. Back in the day so too was the builder who chose the highest point to build the grandest home to take in the Bellarine Peninsulas views and northerly aspect. Sitting on the front balcony the views feel like they go forever, whilst sitting on the rear balcony you can enjoy the night lights of Victorias 2nd largest city. You are introduced to the home through a large entry foyer flowing into the rumpus room with wet bar, and having access to the home office and double garage. Upstairs accommodation consists of a north facing lounge with multiple access points onto the balcony, kitchen & dining with views across to Geelong, 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a westerly faced balcony with stairwell into the yard. Set on 683 square meters of land within walking distance to the Clifton Springs Golf Club, The Dell water front, walking tracks and marina, this is a rare opportunity to secure the best views on the Bellarine Peninsula.
Insights: 4 other 5 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.
